name: Snow Globe (Unicorpse)
description:
Enter the ❄️Snow Globe!❄️

Made as part of the Tinderbox Holiday Game Jam 2021

☃️❄️☃️

Idea credit to Liam Dempsey aka Deep Sea Creature, who inspired me to think what being in a snow globe might be like!

❄️☃️❄️

Special Snowperson Snow Globe Extra:

Double click/tap the door in the menu for a singing snowperson choir!

☃️❄️☃️

Game design/audio/art by Luci Holland

#TinderboxHolidayGameJam

❄️☃️❄️

Controls

Snow Globe ❄️

  • Use a keyboard (WASD) & mouse, or tilt/tap your touchscreen device to explore (may not work on all phones/devices)
  • The more you move, the more it snows! 

Snowperson Choir ☃️

  • Drag heads to start singing & change volume 
  • Doubletap heads to stop 
  • Doubletap bodies to delete 
  • Doubletap icon in top left to create more singers!

Double click/tap "Menu" or hit the Escape key to exit

☃️❄️☃️
